snippet.title: Heroes of Valor Early Teaser (pre-alpha)
snippet.description:
A first teaser for our casual hero shooter game Heroes of Valor. Set in cute stylized adaptation of world war 2. Fight on foot as a heroic soldier with special abilities, drive a tank or fly a plane. Play alone or together with or against your friends in CO-OP / PVP.

Join the official Discord for more info and the latest news: https://discord.gg/SQEYH4wJ7d

Coming to Steam soon!
